name: Bubbles Versus Troubles
description:
--- The plot ---

A spooky, un-friendly competition between the silly and lighty Bubbleheads against the Troubles.

The Bubbleheads only dream of having peace and the guidance of the Light Bulbs. But to achieve that, they have to be connected.

The Troubles only dream is to sleep with a full belly. To achive that, they just have to...eat Bubbleheads.

--- Game Controls ---

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera rotation

Left Mouse Button (Bubbleheads) - Turn lights on/off

Left Mouse Button (Troubles) - Spit deadly projectiles

--- Game Winning Conditions ---

Bubbleheads will win the game once they remain enough time connected to others (by getting close to them). They win when the Light bar is completed.

Troubles will wwin the game when they eat enough Bubbleheads. This is also visible on the top bar.
